qas.question: Much medieval literature was influenced by the works of what classic culture?
What form of literature enjoyed the most widespread popularity during the Middle Ages?
What element is characteristic of a medieval romance?

answers.text: an adventurous and sometimes magical narrative

qas.question: What helped cause the widespread appearance of multiple forms of literature in the Renaissance?
What is an early example of the novel form of literature from Europe?
Greek classic literature influenced what genre of literature?
What genre was the most characteristic form of the Bronze Ages?

plausible_answers.text: Controversial, religious, political and instructional literature

qas.question: What literature proliferated during the Revival?
Modern romance developed into what type of narrative?

plausible_answers.text: Chinese Monkey and the German Faust books.

qas.question: What are two late important examples of the novel?
What type of literature did Greek culture influenced?
What form of literature had limited popularity during the Middle Ages?

plausible_answers.text: Controversial, religious, political and instructional literature

qas.question: What types of literature emerged during the Revival?
What is an early example of the novel from Russia?

plausible_answers.text: Controversial, religious, political and instructional literature

qas.question: What proliferated during the Middle Ages as a result of the printing invention?
What is German Monkey an important example of?
What is the Chinese Faust books an example of?

context: <a0_0>Roman<a0_0/> histories and biographies anticipated the extensive <b5_0><b10_0>mediaeval literature<b10_0/><b5_0/> of lives of saints and miraculous chronicles, but the most characteristic form of the Middle Ages was <a1_0>the <b6_0><b11_0>romance<b11_0/><b6_0/><a1_0/>, <a2_0>an adventurous and sometimes magical narrative<a2_0/> with strong popular appeal. <b7_0><b12_0><b14_0>Controversial, religious, political and instructional literature<b14_0/><b12_0/><b7_0/> proliferated during the Renaissance as a result of <a3_0>the invention of printing<a3_0/>, while the mediaeval romance developed into a more character-based and psychological form of narrative, <b8_0><b15_0><b16_0>the novel<b16_0/><b15_0/><b8_0/>, of which early and important examples are the <b9_0>Chinese Monkey and <a4_0><b13_0>the German Faust books<b13_0/><a4_0/>.
